title: LOOKING FOR BRISBANE LOL PLAYERS. DIAMOND 4+. IGNITE E-Sports.
body:
A new Gaming Cafe has opened up in Brisbane and is looking to sponsor players to play for the Cafe. It will provide all gaming equipment, coaches and game time necessary to improve your individual skill and over play in the game. Please enquire by replying to this thread or reaching the contacts listed below!

What we look for:
- Diamond 4+ Solo is highly desirable 
- Strong passion for gaming
- Willing to improve 
- Good attitude
- Can accept constructive criticism 

Thanks for your time!

Contacts
Mobile: 0400018539
Email: sfako7@hotmail.com
https://www.facebook.com/igniteesportscentre/

replies.body: I'm a platinum support, and I'm extremely positive and happy to take constructive feedback. I'm continuing to improve and would enjoy improving within a team. I live in the Brisbane area, and I'm capable and available to commit to training as much as needed.
